thread.section_title: Cruise Sale Finder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruise Sale Finder | www.cruisesalefinder.co.nz
thread.title: Michelle Priest
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Michelle Priest

author: Michelle Priest
title: Michelle Priest
text:
Got placed on "hold" x3 individual times over x3 phone calls in one day.
Left messages on their automatic answer phone after the 6-7 minute wait of "hold" and still nobody returned my call.
However, the bargain price of the cruise was excellent!!
